bored.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: tired and impatient because you do not think something is interesting, or because you have nothing to do
bored.translation[0].definitions[0].note: bored stiff/to tears/to death/out of your mind (=extremely bored)
bored.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: After a while, I got bored and left.
Are you bored with your present job?
bored.translation[0].note_box[0].section: I get bored if I’m at home on my own all day.
She grew bored and started gazing out of the window.
Some of the students were starting to look bored.
Teenagers are easily bored in the holidays.
Rob was bored to tears trailing around the shops.
Patti was bored stiff with small-town Massachusetts life.
be bored out of your mind
In some of the lessons, I was bored out of my mind.
bored.translation[0].note_box[1].section: feeling that you are not interested in something or that you have nothing interesting to do
Julia soon got bored with lying on the beach.
I'm bored. Can we go home now?
feeling very bored and annoyed or unhappy – used especially when something has continued for too long, and you do not want it to continue any longer
He got fed up with his old job and decided to start looking for a new one.
I’m fed up with listening to you complain!
You sound a bit fed up. Is everything alright?
to feel very annoyed and bored with something that has continued for too long. Be sick of somebody/something sounds stronger and more annoyed than be tired of somebody/something
People are tired of hearing politicians make promises that they never keep.
Do it yourself – I’m sick of cleaning up after you!
to be so bored with something that has continued for a long time that you decide to leave, do something different, or change the situation
She put up with him for ten years before she finally decided that she had had enough.
I've had enough of all this moaning! Can we try and be more positive?
bored.translation[0].note_box[2].heading: USAGE: Bored or boring?
bored.translation[0].note_box[2].items[0: You use bored about a person who is not interested in something
bored.translation[0].note_box[2].items[1: You use boring about something that makes you feel bored
